data.title: Lectures and Events
data.text:
Innovations in Tobacco Control Lecture Series

The Institute hosts the monthly Innovations in Tobacco Control lecture series where key researchers and experts share ideas, present their work, and spark discussion. We currently present lectures online through Zoom. Join our mailing list to receive emails about upcoming lectures. Watch previous lectures here or on our YouTube channel.

Upcoming Events

There are no upcoming events currently scheduled. Check back soon!
